    Methods in game.enemies with parameters of type ActionList
    Modifier and Type Method Description
    Action Goomba.playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    actions: ActionList of allowable actions of Goomba lastAction: Previous action of Goomba map: current GameMap display: current Display object Figure out what to do next.
    Action Koopa.playTurn​(ActionList actions, Action lastAction, GameMap map, Display display)
    actions: ActionList of allowable actions of Koopa lastAction: Previous action of Koopa map: current GameMap display: current Display object returns: current action of Koopa.
